Control Name: Restricts the Ability to Perform Transmission—Data loss prevention processes and technologies are used to restrict ability to authorize and execute transmission, movement and removal of information.

control_attributes.Control: Restricts the Ability to Perform Transmission—Data loss prevention processes and technologies are used to restrict ability to authorize and execute transmission, movement and removal of information.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC6.7 The entity restricts the transmission, movement, and removal of information to authorized internal and external users and processes, and protects it during transmission, movement, or removal to meet the entity’s objectives.
